ComicInfo.Summary:
A new series from the hit TV show “Bob’s Burgers,” created by Loren Bouchard! All right! The very first Bob’s Burgers comic book, a new series from the creator of the hit TV show, created by Loren Bouchard! Now you can read about the Belcher family (parents Bob and Linda, and their children Tina, Gene and Louise) in brand-new in-canon stories created by the TV show’s producers, writers and animators creating all original stories appearing exclusively in this comics series. Each comic includes hilarious installments of: “Louise’s Unsolved Mysteries,” “Tina’s Erotic Friend Fiction,” “A Gene Belcher Original Musical,” “Letters Written by Linda” and “Bob’s Burgers of the Day.” Bob’s Burgers is an American animated sitcom that airs on Fox television with other hits such as The Simpsons and Family Guy!
ContentsTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: My So-Called Life As A HorseBurger of the Day Ideas: TV Catch Phrase Burgers & Hits of the 80s BurgersLouise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities: Picture DayLetters From Linda: Dear 'Apparently You're Parenting' MagazineGene Belcher Presents: The Boy In the Burger, The Musical*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Devin Roth | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Devin Roth | 8 | RE | Retailer Exclusive Shared Cover | Tony Gennaro and Bernard Derriman | 9 | RE | Baltimore Comic Con "Equestranauts" Cover | ? | 3 | RE | Baltimore Comic Con "Equestranauts" Black & White Cover | ? | 4 | RE | Baltimore Comic Con "Equestranauts" Virgin Cover | ? | 5 | RE | Midtown Comics Exclusive Cover | ? | 2 | RE | Blank Authentix Cover | None | 10 | RI | Retailer Incentive Virgin Cover | Devin Roth | 11 | RI | Retailer Incentive Virgin Cover | Devin Roth | Missing | 2nd | Second Printing Cover | ? | 7 | 3rd | Third Printing Cover | ? | 6 |
